text: Ni nui ta a koto ɠɛɛna bɔɔla nuɓusɛi ta laalɔɠɔma, GALA ka é ga tukpɔɠaaleʋe nui naazu, kɛlɛ zɔi é kotoi ɠɛɛzu, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɓɔɠɔi laalɔɠɔma, ɓɛ ɠa a naama nui maavaawo?» Eli nii kpein boni, kɛlɛ ná-doun zunuiti ti la ɠɛni kɛɛni, ti ʋa ti-ɠɛɛ wooi zo, tɔɔzei Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI deveni niina ga ti za.
